endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: A horse galloping on a street

parameters.name: timestep_t0

param_schema.title: Timestep T0
param_schema.description: Perform DDPM steps from t0 to t1. The larger the gap between t0 and t1, the more variance between the frames. Ensure t0 < t1

parameters.description: Perform DDPM steps from t0 to t1. The larger the gap between t0 and t1, the more variance between the frames. Ensure t0 < t1

parameters.name: timestep_t1

param_schema.title: Timestep T1
param_schema.description: Perform DDPM steps from t0 to t1. The larger the gap between t0 and t1, the more variance between the frames. Ensure t0 < t1
